summary:
This mod adds to the game new headdress - crown of the stepmother of the SnowWhite.
(model was created to be similar to the crown from the movie \"SnowWhite and the Huntsmen\")
Version for the man is also available.
descriptionHtml:
[color=lightblue][b]Name:		SnowWhite Crown[/b][/color]
Date:		2013/07/01
Version:		1.00
Author:		Anton

[heading][color=yellow]Description:[/color][/heading]
This mod adds to the game new headdress - crown of the stepmother of the SnowWhite.
(model was created to be similar to the crown from the movie \"SnowWhite and the Huntsmen\")
Version for the man is also available.

[heading][color=yellow]How to get it:[/color][/heading]
You can create the crown in any forge if you have appropriate ingredients. (Topic: Jewelry)

[heading][color=yellow]Install:[/color][/heading]
Unpack mod to the game\'s \"\\Data\" folder.
Activate plugin in launcher \"SnowWhite Crown.esp\"
(mod archive compatible with NNM and WrayBash installers)

[heading][color=yellow]Uninstall:[/color][/heading]
Remove folders:
- \"data\\meshes\\[Anton] mods\\SnowWhite Crown\"
- \"data\\textures\\[Anton] mods\\SnowWhite Crown\"
and file \"SnowWhite Crown.esp\"

[heading][color=yellow]Uncompatibilities:[/color][/heading]
None at all !
(because this mod don\'t have any scripts and don\'t change any existed game data)

[heading][color=yellow]Credits:[/color][/heading]
Developers of [color=lightblue]Blender 2.65+[/color]
Developers of Paint.NET
NifTools team for Nifskope
Site \"render911.ru\" for free textures
Bethesda for the game and Creation Kit
to users, who helped me with suggestions when i was making this mod.
Me and my tools for newest Blender ([url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34226//?]MeshInjector[/url]/[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34373//?]SkinInjector[/url]) for the rest :)

[heading][color=yellow]Permissions:[/color][/heading]
Play with mod as you like, but don\'t change anything and don\'t upload it to another sites without my permission, please.

[heading][color=yellow]My other mods:[/color][/heading]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36414//?]Unique Animated Crown[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38243//?]Unique Animated Crown (new version)[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21453/?]Summon Animated Larvae[/url]
author: Anton
